name: Nightmare Room - Gamejam Submission
description:
You play as a kid who gets stuck in a Nightmare. The only way out is finding the door to your room, but room repeats and things get scary. This game has 3 levels to play in, some cutscenes, and many more! However, it is incomplete in terms of player dying properly, not all mobs being added in such as Humanoid Bunny or Doll, and the audio not being all done. BUT still playable and possible to beat!  

Not too shabby for a first game jam I'll say lol
